SameSideException - Exception in logic
This class is meant to act as a custom exception for code validating move validity.
SameSideException() - Constructor for exception logic.SameSideException
Creates a new SameSideException.
SameSideException(String) - Constructor for exception logic.SameSideException
Creates a new SameSideException using the passed in message.
saveGame(File) - Method in class logic.Game
Saves the current state of the game to a binary file for later reading.

Sets the column of the coordinate to the passed in value.

Sets the variable used to determine who's turn it is.

This method allows the _gameBoard field that is used to store the game board internally, to be set.

Sets the game mode.
